sentences.english: You are not allowed to use invisibility skill in the family battlefields .
sentences.chinese: 您不得使用隐形技术在家庭战场。

sentences.english: Seems to me the desire here is a semi stealthly fighter bomber that is affordable.
sentences.chinese: 在我看来这是架廉价的半隐形战斗轰炸机。

sentences.english: But Myhra argues that the plane was indeed intentionally designed for stealth.
sentences.chinese: 但是Myhra辩称这架飞机确实是为了隐形而设计。

sentences.english: Then we propose the protocol of teleportation of Milburn via such quantum states.
sentences.chinese: 然后以上述量子态作为纠缠资源讨论了隐形传态方案。

sentences.english: Compared with conscious education, subconscious education has its own characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 隐形教育与显形教育相比，有其自身明显的特征。

sentences.english: It has made a super stealth plane that cannot be seen or heard by anyone.
sentences.chinese: 它制造了没人看得见或者听得见的超级隐形飞机。

sentences.english: The J-31 is China's second domestically produced stealth fighter.
sentences.chinese: 31是中国第二款国产隐形战机。

sentences.english: The stealth fighter is a milestone in the world history of military aviation.
sentences.chinese: 隐形战机是世界军事航空史上的一个里程碑。

sentences.english: Photos and videos of the new stealth bomber were published on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 一种新型隐形轰炸机的图片和视频也在网上公布。

sentences.english: A technology of the concealed teeth correcting equipment is developed.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种基于光固化法的隐形牙齿矫治器的制作技术。

sentences.english: I guess that would go good with the stealth missle they came out with.
sentences.chinese: 我猜配上他们搞的隐形导弹，会很不错。

sentences.english: The power of invisibility may soon be more than just a sci-fi fantasy.
sentences.chinese: 隐形能力可能很快使科幻小说中的幻想成为现实。

sentences.english: In this sense, the novel can be regarded as an invisible writing of his initial experience of life.
sentences.chinese: 《牛天赐传》是老舍生命初始经验的隐形书写。

sentences.english: Schistosomes also possess what seems to be a cloak of invisibility: an unusual covering known as the tegument .
sentences.chinese: 血吸虫还有一种如同隐形披风的特殊外衣，称为体壁。

sentences.english: Wore invisible glasses wears sunglasses again, does cross-eye eyeball have disadvantage?
sentences.chinese: 戴了隐形眼镜再戴墨镜，对眼睛有坏处吗？

sentences.english: You want the tank to be invisible, not highlighted by waterdrops.
sentences.chinese: 你希望水缸是隐形的，而非“晶晶亮，透心凉”。

definition: to hide oneself/invisible (person or online status)
to hide/to conceal/to mask/to shelter/to harbor (i.e. keep sth hidden)/to hide oneself/to lie low/to nestle/hidden/implicit/private/covert/recessed (lighting)
